survey_name: Consumer Preferences for AI-Powered Home Fitness Equipment Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding AI-powered home fitness equipment, including usage patterns, features most valued, and barriers to adoption.

questions.question_text: How often do you currently use home fitness equipment?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard frequency scale to ensure comparability. Ensure options cover all likely usage patterns.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons. Randomize options to avoid order bias.

script.question_text: How often do you currently use home fitness equipment?

questions.question_text: Which features are most important to you when choosing AI-powered home fitness equipment? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices
questions.client_notes: This helps prioritize product development. Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes. Include 'Other' with open-text option if needed.

script.question_text: Which features are most important to you when choosing AI-powered home fitness equipment? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you have not purchased AI-powered home fitness equipment?
answer_options: Don't see the added value of AI features
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 answer is 'Never'
questions.client_notes: This identifies barriers to adoption. Include an 'Other' option to capture unlisted reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons with open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you have not purchased AI-powered home fitness equipment?
answer_options: Don't see the added value of AI features
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 answer is 'Never'

questions.question_text: How much would you be willing to pay for high-quality AI-powered home fitness equipment?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use clear price brackets to gauge budget expectations. Ensure ranges are realistic for the market.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons. Randomize options to avoid order bias.

script.question_text: How much would you be willing to pay for high-quality AI-powered home fitness equipment?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1

questions.question_text: What additional features or improvements would you like to see in AI-powered home fitness equipment?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture innovative ideas. Keep it optional to avoid survey fatigue.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text. Limit response length to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What additional features or improvements would you like to see in AI-powered home fitness equipment?
